Name: PvZ2_Preprelease_KF_P1

Updates.en: **Jurassic Marsh might be finished in the future.**
**The author has his own plan to design the Kongfu Temple world, needless of guidance.**
Updates.zh: **作者对武林寺庙世界已经有规划，不需要指导。**

Updates.en: Added Bronze of Hook, Kongfu Monk Imp and Devil of Dynamite.
Updates.zh: 加入功夫侠客铜人、武僧小鬼、火药魔头。

Updates.en: Added Kongfu Temple Worldmap, with new Levels (9-24, by @保罗-刘).
Updates.zh: 加入武林寺庙世界地图（新增关卡9-24，作者@保罗-刘）。

NewFeatures: **作者对武林寺庙世界已经有规划，不需要指导。**
加入功夫侠客铜人、武僧小鬼、火药魔头。
加入武林寺庙世界地图（新增关卡9-24，作者@保罗-刘）。
EnNewFeatures: **Jurassic Marsh might be finished in the future.**
**The author has his own plan to design the Kongfu Temple world, needless of guidance.**
